verbs.description: It [V: ’s] been years since Donald Trump descended the elevator at Trump Tower and announced he would run for president .
It ’s [V: been] [ARG2: years] [ARG1: since Donald Trump descended the elevator at Trump Tower and announced he would run for president] .
It ’s been years since [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: descended] [ARG1: the elevator at Trump Tower] and announced he would run for president .
It ’s been years since [ARG0: Donald Trump] descended the elevator at Trump Tower and [V: announced] [ARG1: he would run for president] .
It ’s been years since Donald Trump descended the elevator at Trump Tower and announced he [V: would] run for president .
It ’s been years since Donald Trump descended the elevator at Trump Tower and announced [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: run] [ARG1: for president] .
